review: The Amazon Fire TV is easy to connect to your TV. I'm not electronic savvy and this was very simple. The voice makes it simple to find what you want to watch. The remote is easy to use. The only thing that I find irritating with the product is that I have to reset it by unplugging the unit and re-plugging it back in. I have a password protection on it so my children can not watch something that I feel is to mature for them. Every few days, it will start looping (for lack of a better term to use for what it is doing) and not let me finish putting in my password. A few times it has gone to a blue screen and I had to reboot it then also. If this bug could be fixed then I would say this streaming device is perfect. Fast streaming, easy to use and secure for children.
